application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Discharge of Planning Conditions 5 (Waste and Recycling Facilities), 6 (Secure Cycle Parking Facilities) and 7 (C02 Emissions and Internal Water Usage Rates) of Planning Permission ref: 20/01777/FUL (Partial change of use of premises to create self-contained residential flat (Use Class C3) and retention of takeway food outlet at ground floor level (Use Class A5) with associated alterations and part demolition and part rebuilding of rear extension) dated 25/11/2020

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The 'Design and Access Statement' does not have site photo, please submit, time stamp photo, it is validation requirement.

Condition 5 (Cycle Parking) - Officers have reviewed the  proposed cycle parking  provision as shown on Proposed Plans  (drawing no 24.01-111 Rev B)   prepared by  Spires Architects dated 15.01.24 .The applicant is informed that the submitted details are agreed and that  planning condition 5 ( Cycle Parking) of planning permission ref : 24/00585/HOU  is hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with details hereby approved
